channel.title: CVE Feed for Web Tips Co.,Ltd -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-46898|2024-10-15T06:10:30.968Z -- web%20tips%20co.%2Cltd -- shirasagi
item.description: SHIRASAGI prior to v1.19.1 processes URLs in HTTP requests improperly, resulting in a path traversal vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, arbitrary files on the server may be retrieved when processing crafted HTTP requests.
